content.content: Hello. If you have been currently or previously involved in the EIP process, please make sure to fill out the EIPIP survey if you haven’t already. The survey can be found here. Edson Ayllon Ethereum Cat Herders
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is asking for feedback from individuals who have been involved in the EIP process and is extending an invitation to fill out the EIPIP survey.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
